featured.text: Many of us strive hard to change our body, but in vain.
First, I think we got this striving from our mother to make the world a better place.
The Icelandic project, from which this pioneering procedure emerged, strives for making a fundamental change in the marine industry.

definition.zh_def: 努力，奮鬥，為達成某個目標而付出艱苦的努力。
definition.en_def: To make great efforts to achieve or obtain something.
definition.example: She will strive to improve her grades this semester.
